QueryResult.text: SELECT R.USER_ID USER_ID, AP.OBJECT_ID, OS.INSTANCE_ID OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID, PE.PERMISSION_CODE, PE.PERMISSION_VALUE, OS.ID, R.ID R_ID, AP.ID AP_ID, PE.ID PE_ID FROM CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS PE, CMN_SEC_ASSGND_OBJ_PERM AP, CMN_SEC_ASSGND_RIGHT OS, PRJ_OBS_ASSOCIATIONS OA, OBS_UNITS_FLAT_BY_MODE OU, SRM_RESOURCES R WHERE OA.RECORD_ID = R.ID AND OA.TABLE_NAME = 'SRM_RESOURCES' AND OS.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = OU.UNIT_MODE AND OS.PRINCIPAL_ID = OU.UNIT_ID AND OU.LINKED_UNIT_ID = OA.UNIT_ID AND OS.INSTANCE_TYPE = 'INSTANCE' AND OS.RIGHT_ID = AP.PRINCIPAL_ID AND AP.IS_RIGHT_DEFINITION = 1 AND AP.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'GROUP' AND AP.PERMISSION_ID = PE.PERMISSION_ID
